name: Miner Inconvenience
description:
Miner Inconvenience is a high speed aerial platformer with multiple tools to chain and plenty of levels to explore. The game is built for players who enjoy exploration and discovery or who want to master a simple, yet powerful and diverse movement system. 

Explore handcrafted levels of increasing difficulty, pushing the boundaries of the mechanics and clearing levels in creative ways!   Quickly switch between four  dynamic tools to build momentum, launching yourself over obstacles and sailing through narrow passages.  Help our villainous protagonist collect minerals and diamonds to fuel his evil machines!

Use the air cannon to blast yourself in any direction you choose!

Propel yourself in a new direction by using the grapplehook to swing  through wide open spaces!

Climb dirt walls and hang from the ceiling using the versatile pickaxe!

Accelerate through dangerous pathways with precision using the pickaxe-dash!

Burrow through dirt, carrying your speed and ejecting yourself high into the air!

Combine, sequence, and chain these tools to reach insane speeds, navigate complex puzzles, and overcome seemingly impossible challenges!

Can you master this fast-paced, heart-pounding, aerial platformer, overcome our devious and puzzling challenges, and escape the darkest depths of this dangerous cavern?
